trans-unit.source: Represents an object that participates in the dependency property system.
trans-unit.target: 表示参与依赖属性系统的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> class enables [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system services on its many derived classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>类启用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]对其许多的派生类的属性系统服务。

trans-unit.source: The property system's primary function is to compute the values of properties, and to provide system notification about values that have changed.
trans-unit.target: 属性系统的主要功能是计算属性的值，并提供有关已更改的值的系统通知。

trans-unit.source: Another key class that participates in the property system is <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 参与属性系统的另一个密钥类是<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> enables the registration of dependency properties into the property system, and provides identification and information about each dependency property, whereas <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> as a base class enables objects to use the dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> 插入属性系统，可以依赖项属性的注册，并可以标识以及有关每个依赖项属性的信息，而<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>基类可支持要使用的依赖项属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> services and characteristics include the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> 服务和特征如下：

trans-unit.source: Dependency property hosting support.
trans-unit.target: 托管支持的依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: You register a dependency property by calling the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> method, and storing the method's return value as a public static field in your class.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用注册的依赖项属性<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>方法，并将该方法的返回值存储为类中的公共静态字段。

trans-unit.source: Attached property hosting support.
trans-unit.target: 托管支持的附加的属性。

trans-unit.source: You register an attached property by calling the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> method, and storing the method's return value as a public static read-only field in your class.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用注册附加的属性<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>方法，并将方法的返回值存储为公共静态只读字段中你的类。

trans-unit.source: (There are also additional member requirements; note that this represents a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] specific implementation for attached properties.
trans-unit.target: (此外还有其他成员要求; 请注意，这表示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附加属性的特定实现。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).) Your attached property can then be set on any class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。)然后可以任何派生自的类上设置附加的属性<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。

trans-unit.source: Get, set, and clear utility methods for values of any dependency properties that exist on the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: Get、 set 和清除存在任何依赖项属性的值的实用工具方法<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。

trans-unit.source: Metadata, coerce value support, property changed notification, and override callbacks for dependency properties or attached properties.
trans-unit.target: 元数据，强制值支持、 属性更改通知和依赖项属性的重写回调或附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> class facilitates the per-owner property metadata for a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>类便于依赖项属性的每个所有者属性元数据。

trans-unit.source: A common base class for classes derived from <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: 类的公共基类派生自<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>， <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>。

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, another base element class, has a class hierarchy that includes <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，另一个基元素类，具有包含的类层次结构<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>。)

trans-unit.source: The following example derives from <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> to create a new abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例派生自<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>创建新的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: The class then registers an attached property and includes support members for that attached property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此类注册附加的属性，并包括支持该附加属性的成员。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Clears the local value of a property.
trans-unit.target: 清除属性的本地值。

trans-unit.source: The dependency property to be cleared, identified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> object reference.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> 对象引用指定的依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: Clears the local value of a property.
trans-unit.target: 清除属性的本地值。

trans-unit.source: The property to be cleared is specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的属性由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> 标识符指定。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the property value by calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A> does not necessarily give a dependency property the default value that is specified in the dependency property metadata.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用清除的属性值<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>不一定会赋予依赖项属性的依赖项属性元数据中指定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the property only specifically clears whatever local value may have been applied.
trans-unit.target: 清除属性只特别清除任何本地值可能被应用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates all properties that have local values set on an object, then calls <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A> to clear the values of each such property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例循环的对象，设置了本地值的所有属性然后调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>清除每个此类属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to call <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue(System.Windows.DependencyProperty)" /> on a sealed <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试对密封 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue(System.Windows.DependencyProperty)" />。

trans-unit.source: The key for the dependency property to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的依赖属性的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Clears the local value of a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 清除只读属性的本地值。

trans-unit.source: The property to be cleared is specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 要清除的属性由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey> identifies a read-only dependency property for property system operations.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey>标识属性系统操作的只读依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that define read-only dependency properties should not expose this key with public access.
trans-unit.target: 定义只读依赖属性的类不应公开此密钥的公共访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A publicly exposed key would provide a public code pathway that negated the read-only character of the property, if methods such as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> could be called outside the class or assembly, referencing the key.
trans-unit.target: 公开提供的键将提供求反后的属性的只读字符公共代码路径，如果等方法<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>无法调用外部类或程序集，引用项。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the property value by calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A> does not necessarily give a dependency property the default value that is specified in the dependency property metadata.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用清除的属性值<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>不一定会赋予依赖项属性的依赖项属性元数据中指定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the value only specifically clears whatever local value may have been applied.
trans-unit.target: 清除值只特别清除任何本地值可能被应用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to call <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue(System.Windows.DependencyProperty)" /> on a sealed <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试对密封 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue(System.Windows.DependencyProperty)" />。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the dependency property to coerce.
trans-unit.target: 要强制转换的依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Coerces the value of the specified dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 对指定依赖属性的值进行强制。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by invoking any <see cref="T:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback" /> function specified in property metadata for the dependency property as it exists on the calling <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过对调用方 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 上存在的依赖属性的属性元数据中所指定的任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback" /> 函数进行调用来完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: In addition to being explicitly invoked through calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback> for a dependency property is also invoked internally whenever the dependency property value is being re-evaluated by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system.
trans-unit.target: 除了通过调用正在显式调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback>依赖项属性也会调用内部的依赖项属性值是正在重新计算出的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统。

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A> method, you are ultimately invoking the coerce value callback for the property that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>方法，将最终调用强制值回调你指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Typically you will invoke <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A> only if you know that a coerce value callback exists, and if you know the callback's criteria for coercion.
trans-unit.target: 通常将调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>唯一的如果你知道强制值回调的存在，并且知道强制的回调的条件。

trans-unit.source: The most common scenario for calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A> is within class handling or property change callbacks of related properties that influence each other's values in a dependent way.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的方案来调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>内的依赖方式影响对方的值的相关属性的类处理或属性更改的回调。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性回调和验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A> within a <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> implementation that is used as the <xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata.PropertyChangedCallback%2A> for a different dependency properties on the same class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>内<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>用作实现<xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata.PropertyChangedCallback%2A>的同一类上不同的依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: This is a common pattern for introducing true value dependencies between dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种常见模式引入 true 值依赖项属性之间的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="dp" /> or its value were invalid or do not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="dp" /> 或其值无效或不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType" /> that wraps the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此实例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 类型进行包装的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType" /> that wraps the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 对此实例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 类型进行包装的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if an object that is returned from a method has a return value type of <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> and you want to perform property system specific operations on it depending on its type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性很有用，如果从方法返回的对象具有的返回值类型<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>并且你想要属性系统特定对其执行操作具体取决于其类型。

trans-unit.source: For example it is more efficient to call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata%28System.Windows.DependencyObjectType%29> using the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> rather than the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它会更加高效调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.GetMetadata%28System.Windows.DependencyObjectType%29>使用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>而不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> facilitates faster lookup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> 便于更快的查找。

trans-unit.source: In the following pseudocode example, `MySubClass` anticipates that additional derived classes might change the default value of the `MyCustom` dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的伪代码示例中，`MySubClass`可预见其他派生的类可能会更改的默认值`MyCustom`依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The class implements a default constructor that can determine the actual derived class by taking advantage of polymorphism on the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType> value whenever that constructor is used as a derived class instantiator.
trans-unit.target: 类实现可以通过利用多态性确定实际的派生的类的默认构造函数<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObjectType>值每次该构造函数使用作为派生的类 instantiator 时。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a provided <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> is equivalent to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 是否等效于当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two instances are the same; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个实例相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is reference equality only, and does not attempt to evaluate value equality of the contained properties.
trans-unit.target: 此实现不引用相等性，因此不会尝试评估的包含属性的值相等。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> overrides and then seals two basic <see cref="T:System.Object" /> methods: <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.Equals(System.Object)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetHashCode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 重写，然后密封两个基本<see cref="T:System.Object" />方法：<see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.Equals(System.Object)" />和<see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetHashCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The overrides call the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementations, resulting in an object equality behavior.
trans-unit.target: 重写调用<see cref="T:System.Object" />实现，从而导致对象是否相等行为。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of these deliberate overrides is to prevent derived classes from trying to define a value equality for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 这些故意重写的目的是为了防止派生的类尝试定义值相等性<see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Value equalities for <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> will never be accurate because of the innate property value-changing capabilities of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> and its dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: 值相等性<see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />将永远不会准确的固有的属性值更改功能由于<see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />及其依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: This includes fundamental [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] features such as data binding and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system.
trans-unit.target: 这包括基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能，如数据绑定和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 带符号 32 位整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> overrides and then seals two <see cref="T:System.Object" /> methods: <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.Equals(System.Object)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetHashCode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 重写，然后密封两个<see cref="T:System.Object" />方法：<see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.Equals(System.Object)" />和<see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetHashCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The overrides call the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementations, resulting in an object equality behavior.
trans-unit.target: 重写调用<see cref="T:System.Object" />实现，从而导致对象是否相等行为。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of these deliberate overrides is to prevent derived classes from trying to define a value equality for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 这些故意重写的目的是为了防止派生的类尝试定义值相等性<see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Value equalities for <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> will never be accurate because of the innate property value-changing capabilities of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> and its dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: 值相等性<see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />将永远不会准确的固有的属性值更改功能由于<see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />及其依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: This includes fundamental [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] features such as data binding and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system.
trans-unit.target: 这包括基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能，如数据绑定和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统。

trans-unit.source: Creates a specialized enumerator for determining which dependency properties have locally set values on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个专用的枚举数，用于确定哪些依赖项属性在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 上具有以本地方式设置的值。

trans-unit.source: A specialized local value enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 一个专用的本地值枚举数。

trans-unit.source: A *local value* is any dependency property value that was set by <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>, as opposed to other aspects of the property system.
trans-unit.target: A*本地值*是任何依赖项属性值所设置<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>，而不是属性系统的其他方面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> obtained by calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A> can be used to enumerate properties that have a locally set value on a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>通过调用获取<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>可用于枚举具有本地设置的属性值在<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>实例。

trans-unit.source: Each such property is represented in the enumerator by a <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> object, which has properties that reference the specific <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> and its values.
trans-unit.target: 每个此类属性表示的枚举器中<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>具有引用特定的属性的对象<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>及其值。

trans-unit.source: This technique of enumerating over the locally set values can be used for optimization or for other handling of local values, such as to determine which property values of a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> would change if they were cleared.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的枚举的本地设置值可以用于优化或其他处理的本地值，如确定的哪些属性值<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>如果它们已清除将更改。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator> might contain <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> records for dependency properties that are read-only, or dependency properties where values are calculated by the property system.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>可能包含<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>依赖项属性是只读的或通过属性系统计算中值的依赖项属性的记录。

trans-unit.source: For example, a visual framework element that has an established width through layout will report a local value for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，通过布局使用确定宽度的可视框架元素将报告的本地值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you are getting local values in order to reset them, check the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A> value on the property identifier of each <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> to verify that the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> in question is not read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果您处于本地值以便重置它们，请检查<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A>上每个属性标识符值<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>以便确认<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>问题不是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates all properties that have local values set on an object, then calls <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A> to clear the values of each such property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例循环的对象，设置了本地值的所有属性然后调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>清除每个此类属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> identifier of the property to retrieve the value for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其检索值的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current effective value of a dependency property on this instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 的此实例返回依赖属性的当前有效值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current effective value.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前有效值。

trans-unit.source: The *effective value* is the value of the property that is returned by the property system to any caller that is requesting the value.
trans-unit.target: *有效值*是通过属性系统返回到正在请求值的任何调用方的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The effective value is the result of the property system having evaluated all the possible inputs that participate in the property system value precedence.
trans-unit.target: 有效值是具有计算参与属性系统值优先级的所有可能的输入属性系统的结果。

trans-unit.source: This includes coercion and animation.
trans-unit.target: 这包括强制和动画。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method will never return <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将永远不会返回<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> is a sentinel value for the property system that is used in various capacities internally and occasionally also exposed through coercion callbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>是用在内部，有时也通过强制回调公开的各种功能的属性系统的 sentinel 值。

trans-unit.source: If you are not sure what the property's type should be, you can query the identifier of the requested dependency property to determine whether there is a more specific <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A> that the return value can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不确定该属性的类型应该是什么，您可以查询要确定是否有更为具体的请求的依赖关系属性的标识符<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A>返回值可以转换为。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="dp" /> or its value was invalid, or the specified <paramref name="dp" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="dp" /> 或其值无效，或者指定的 <paramref name="dp" /> 不存在。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> identifier of the property to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要使其失效的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: Re-evaluates the effective value for the specified dependency property
trans-unit.target: 重新计算指定依赖项属性的有效值

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>, any associated and applicable <xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback> or <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> functions registered for that dependency property might be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>、 任何关联的和适用<xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback>或<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>函数注册为可能调用该依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A> on a property that has its local value set will have no effect, because the local value takes precedence over other property system inputs, except for animations.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>设置其本地值的属性上不起作用，因为本地值优先于其他属性系统输入，动画除外。

trans-unit.source: However, you could call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>, then call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ClearValue%2A>，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A> is not necessarily applicable for many dependency property scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>不一定适用于许多依赖项属性的情形。

trans-unit.source: If a dependency property becomes invalidated because of value changes in any of the constituents, the property system invalidates and re-evaluates the dependency property automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于任何组成部分值更改，因此失效依赖项属性，属性系统使无效，并自动重新计算依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: However, there are still some appropriate scenarios where <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A> is useful.
trans-unit.target: 但是，仍有一些相应方案其中<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>很有用。

trans-unit.source: In particular, you can use <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A> inside the coerce value or property changed callback for a different dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>内强制值或属性更改为不同的依赖属性的回调。

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A> to force re-evaluation of a binding against a data source that is not able to implement the recommended <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> notification mechanism (perhaps if consuming data classes that cannot be derived from, or where the data is a static member).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>以强制重新计算对不能实现推荐的数据源绑定<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>通知机制 (可能是如果使用，不能从，派生或其中的数据是静态的数据类成员）。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A> on a custom property, whenever properties that are involved in the invalidated property's calculations change.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.InvalidateProperty%2A>某个自定义属性，每当失效的属性的计算中涉及的属性更改。

trans-unit.source: This is an alternative technique to calling the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A> method, because invalidating the property will also call any registered <xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata.CoerceValueCallback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这是另一种方法与调用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.CoerceValue%2A>方法，因为将该属性设为无效将同时调用任何注册<xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata.CoerceValueCallback%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance is currently sealed (read-only).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此实例当前是否为密封的（只读）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is sealed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例是密封的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This value is set internally.
trans-unit.target: 内部设置此值。

trans-unit.source: Event data that will contain the dependency property identifier of interest, the property metadata for the type, and old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 将包含相关依赖属性标识符、类型的属性元数据以及旧值和新值的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 每当更新此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 上任何依赖项属性的有效值时调用。

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 更改的特定依赖属性将在事件数据中报告。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to generally detect individual property changes or perform invalidations of properties on a per-case basis.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应通常检测个别属性更改或基于每个用例执行挂起的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A> is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern, if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A> 而被旨在用于修改常规失效模式中，如果查阅宽分类的属性已知的某些信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> might be changes in the value types of the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, or might be subproperties, where the changes are within other <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> references.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在更改<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>可能的值类型中的更改<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，或可能与子属性，其中所做的更改是在其他<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> override implementation of <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A> uses internal information to determine whether the properties are subproperties, and provides appropriate base class logic for either case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>重写实现<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A>使用内部信息来确定属性是否为子属性，并提供适当的基类逻辑以两种情况。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A> is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged%2A> 一个对象的生命周期内可能调用多次。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can achieve better performance for the overall property system if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach <xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback> or <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> functions for individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你可以实现更好的总体属性系统性能重写特定属性的元数据，然后将附加<xref:System.Windows.CoerceValueCallback>或<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>为各个属性的函数。

trans-unit.source: However, you would use this method if a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你将使用此方法<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>包括大量的值相关的依赖项属性，或如果它包括逻辑，如呈现行为，必须重新运行多个相关属性失效的情况。

trans-unit.source: Always call the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用基实现。

trans-unit.source: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, causing incorrect values to be reported.
trans-unit.target: 如果不这样做将显著禁用整个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，导致不正确的值进行报告。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> identifier of the property to retrieve the value for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其检索值的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local value of a dependency property, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则返回依赖属性的本地值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local value, or returns the sentinel value <see cref="F:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue" /> if no local value is set.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地值，或在未设置本地值的情况下返回 sentinel 值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue" />。

trans-unit.source: You should use <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> for most typical "get" operations for a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>依赖项属性的大多数典型"get"操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ReadLocalValue%2A> does not return the effective value for a variety of circumstances where the value was not locally set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.ReadLocalValue%2A> 不会返回很多情况下的生效值其中未本地设置值。

trans-unit.source: Values that are set by styles, themes, templates, the default value from metadata, or property value inheritance are not considered to be local values.
trans-unit.target: 值由样式、 主题、 模板设置，从元数据或属性值继承的默认值是不被视为本地值。

trans-unit.source: However, bindings and other expressions are considered to be local values, after they have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 但是，被视为绑定和其他表达式将本地值之后已对它们进行评估。

trans-unit.source: When no local value is set, this method returns <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>.
trans-unit.target: 当未不设置任何本地值时，此方法会返回<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>。

trans-unit.source: If the returned value is other than <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>, you can query the metadata of the requested dependency property to determine whether there is a more specific type that the return value can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的值而不是<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>，您可以查询请求的依赖关系属性，以确定是否存在返回值可以转换为更具体类型的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the dependency property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的依赖属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The new local value.
trans-unit.target: 新的本地值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a dependency property without changing its value source.
trans-unit.target: 设置依赖属性的值而不更改其值源。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by a component that programmatically sets the value of one of its own properties without disabling an application's declared use of the property.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式设置其自己的属性之一的值，但不能禁用应用程序的声明的属性使用的组件使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetCurrentValue%2A> method changes the effective value of the property, but existing triggers, data bindings, and styles will continue to work.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetCurrentValue%2A>方法更改的生效值的属性，但现有的触发器、 数据绑定和样式将继续工作。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to modify a read-only dependency property, or a property on a sealed <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试修改只读依赖项属性，或尝试修改密封 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 上的属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> was not the correct type as registered for the <paramref name="dp" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型不是为 <paramref name="dp" /> 属性注册时使用的正确类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local value of a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 设置依赖属性的本地值。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the dependency property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的依赖属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The new local value.
trans-unit.target: 新的本地值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local value of a dependency property, specified by its dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 设置依赖属性的本地值，该值由其依赖属性标识符指定。

trans-unit.source: If the provided type does not match the type that is declared for the dependency property as it was originally registered, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果所提供的类型与按最初注册依赖属性声明的类型不匹配，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter should always be provided as the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: `value`应该始终提供参数，以适合的类型。

trans-unit.source: The exception conditions are potentially influenced by the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ValidateValueCallback%2A> callback that exists on the dependency property identifier of the dependency property being set.
trans-unit.target: 异常条件可能受<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ValidateValueCallback%2A>位于要设置的依赖项属性的依赖项属性标识符的回调。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value provided might be failing general type-checking conditions (for example, passing a string when the native type is Double).
trans-unit.target: 否则，提供的值可能无法满足常规类型检查的条件 （例如，将字符串传递时的本机类型为 Double）。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to modify a read-only dependency property, or a property on a sealed <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试修改只读依赖项属性，或尝试修改密封 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 上的属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> was not the correct type as registered for the <paramref name="dp" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型不是为 <paramref name="dp" /> 属性注册时使用的正确类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey" /> identifier of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: The new local value.
trans-unit.target: 新的本地值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local value of a read-only dependency property, specified by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey" /> identifier of the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个只读依赖属性的本地值，该值由依赖属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey" /> 标识符指定。

trans-unit.source: This signature is generally used when you set values for read-only dependency properties that are defined by your custom classes.
trans-unit.target: 当你设置由您的自定义类定义的只读依赖属性的值时，通常使用该签名。

trans-unit.source: Generally, <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> is called only from the type that registered that dependency property, which implements the internal logic that provides the determined value for the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>只能从注册实现提供确定的值的依赖项属性的内部逻辑该依赖属性的类型调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Read-Only Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/read-only-dependency-properties.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[只读依赖属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/read-only-dependency-properties.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the provided type does not match the type that is declared for the dependency property as it was originally registered, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果所提供的类型与按最初注册依赖属性声明的类型不匹配，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter should always be provided as the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: `value`应该始终提供参数，以适合的类型。

trans-unit.source: The exception conditions are potentially influenced by the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ValidateValueCallback%2A> callback that exists on the dependency property identifier of the dependency property being set.
trans-unit.target: 异常条件可能受<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ValidateValueCallback%2A>位于要设置的依赖项属性的依赖项属性标识符的回调。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a read-only dependency property, along with a `public static readonly` <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> that provides necessary read-only exposure to property consumers, and the get accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个只读依赖属性，以及`public static readonly`<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>提供必要只读遭受属性使用者和的 get 访问器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]包装器。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the dependency property that should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 应被序列化的依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the value for the provided dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化进程是否应序列化所提供的依赖属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dependency property that is supplied should be value-serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应对提供的依赖项属性的值进行序列化，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns `true` for all cases in which a dependency property had a local value established on the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回`true`对于在其中一个依赖项属性具有本地值上建立的所有情况<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>。

trans-unit.source: Overrides for this method might handle specific dependency properties differently.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的替代可能以不同方式处理特定的依赖项属性。
